price: 7. Waxay ka ahaayeen goob joog waxay ku falayeen (oo gardarro ah) Mu’miniinta.
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
